Name: Periphery
Details: Roughly considered to be the area between 450 and 550 light years from Terra, the Periphery is known for the independence of its inhabitants, the remoteness and poverty and lack of development of its worlds and the contempt for the Inner Sphere. Some of the most important Periphery states are the Taurian Concordat, the Magistracy of Canopus and the Outworlds Alliance.
